reviewText: There are two types of kettlebell dvds, workout and instructional. A workout dvd is one where the viewer exercises with the presenter. An instructional dvd is one where the viewer learns facts, such as proper form and other useful advice, from the presenter. The Great Kettlebell DVD is an instructional dvd. The presenters will show you the proper form for each exercise, advice on the size of the kettlebell, etc. It will be up to the viewer to create his/her own exercise workout. I liked the main presenter, James Talo, but found him to be slightly boring and he spoke in a monotone; some personality or humor would have helped. I also would have like the camera to be closer to the subject. For those with small tv sets, seeing the presenter's actions was hard to make out. I do recommend this dvd for the proper way to exercise with a kettlebell. For beginner's workout dvds, I recommend Absolute Beginners Fitness: 3 in 1 Kettlebell Amy Bento - Recommended by Prevention Magazine (kettle bell),Kettlebells The Iron Core Way Volume 1 (Complete Guide to Kettlebell Training with Follow Along Workout) (along with Volumes 2 and 3), and The Kettlebell Goddess Workout: How to Achieve and Maintain a Divine Body with the World's Most Effective Tool for Weight Loss, Strength, Endurance and Flexibility.
